ygData.subject: cummulative summary again
ygData.msgSnippet: Welp.. again I find myself having not had time to check the boards in a while. I couldn t even see how far back I had to go to see what was new.
ygData.messageBody:
Welp.. again I find myself having not had time to
check the boards in a while. I couldn't even see how
far back I had to go to see what was new.
LOL.<br><br>Glad to see the boards are doing well.<br><br>1)
Blech. Yeah. Girls seem to get a lot. I assume this is
coming out of my discussion of my poor druid being asked
if he was about to be trashed-- from the level 35
female Elven character whose friends had given her
enough equip to have 198 wisdom. LOL<br><br>Yes. Women
get a lot of free things. Still will always play male
though. Otherwise, I couldn't entertain and tease
mercilessly those poor females. Especially the one's with
beards or trolls with the last name of Dancing. Grin.
Yes Gert and Kas. That would be you if you read these
boards. Grin. Probably not.<br><br>2) Anyhoo, My
guildmates and EQ in general seems to be obsessed with
items. And yes, it can give you long term sustaining
power that will help you kite or clear out a ton of
monsters. But I've noticed something else. Downtime, I have
a quicker turn around b/c I have less mana to med
up to. I've never really kited, and always group for
everything. <br><br>So I sit and am FOM a lot more often than
my partymates. Which to me makes me wonder. If
usually the pullers are pulling when other casters are at
60 to 80, and I'm at 100.. what's the point of
having that extra stuff as a caster.<br><br>Admittedly,
as a mellee-type the boats completely different, but
I spend my money on spells and tradeskills. Never
have much for equipment. Have bought about 800pp in
equipment over the last year though. But compared to
tradeskills and spells combined... last level I spent 270
plat easy (lvl 39 spells rock though).<br><br>dang,
sorry to go so long.<br><br>shooman out... be well
all<br>Fatedhue Prismatic of the Drinal server<br>Officer in
Tribunal of the Antiquities.<br><br>PS... had a
conversation-- only works once in group chat.<br><br>When asking
about loot distribution and who has what...
occasionally they ask, "what does everyone have now?" This
works best in CC when everyone's splitting equal stacks
of Crystalline silk.<br><br>Just answer them,
"Potato" or "Vermouth" or what not. =)<br><br>And yes. I
am crazy.
